Articles.Content: Interested in starting a post about speed challenges, for example, who can get to the mun and back fastest. Upload a video of your fastest times and let the competition begin!

Please define "fastest".

Do you mean least amount of in-game time, or least amount of wall time?

Edited October 26, 2016 by razark

What would be great is a contracts creator with adjustable sliders of contract's expiry time. You set the expiry date to be sooner - you get higher rewards. You set it to be much later - the rewards are lower.

**Psssst-Wrong forum**

a mun rush can get pretty insane, we've already had a few on the forum a while back.  There was a guy with like a 40000m/s Delta V rocket returning to kerbin with nothing but a lawn chair.
